p.em: The candidate’s responsibilities will be to design/architect new applications/platforms in Marklogic using all capabilities of the product for better performance/maintainability compared to any RDBMS applications.

li.em: Understand application requirements (current and future) and design ML data model to satisfy needs
Understands use of ML triple store and Semantics and use in applications
Write ML queries and pipeline to be integrated with Application Middle tier
XQuery, FLWOR queries, JavaScript, Marklogic cts:search, SPARQL, RDF data, XML Data, triple-stores, XML Processing
Based on business requirements, able to define and tune the search relevancy
Be able to integrate various ML instances (different applications) to provide consolidated view of data
Provide assistant in integrating with tools that allow Natural Language Processing
Familiar with competing products like Google Search, HP IDOL, IBM SOLR, etc

Strong analytical and design skills, including the ability to understand business requirements and translate them into efficient and effective technical designs that work well within large-scale, well-structured enterprise environments
Excellent trouble-shooting skills, with the ability to quickly identify and document the root cause of issues, and effectively communicate possible resolutions

p.em: Effective communication, presentation, and collaboration skills
